messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/18/2002 9:29:01 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:
>>>> Some of us just have many children....
> But the story telling festival is about $300 for a family for the weekend
> and
> there is NO guarantee you'll even run into another unschooler!! yep, it's a
>
> bargain.<<<
>

And HERE you can get the whole family in for the bargain price of $175 for
the weekend---no matter HOW many children you have! (as long as you're all a
part of the same family!)

Kelly
Kelly Lovejoy, Coordinator
Schools Out Support

messages.subject: conventions/conferences
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/18/02 5:10:39 AM Central Daylight Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:  It is,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/18/02 5:10:39 AM Central Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< thought $55/adult and $35/child was a bargain. >>

It is, it is!! Some of us just have many children....
But the story telling festival is about $300 for a family for the weekend and
there is NO guarantee you'll even run into another unschooler!! yep, it's a
bargain.
I can't wait.

Ren

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] conventions/conferences
messages.msgSnippet: I think it would suit us well. I will wear one. ~Elissa Cleaveland It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction have not yet
messages.messageBody:
I think it would suit us well.
I will wear one.
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein

messages.subject: conventions/conferences
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/14/02 4:37:59 PM Central Daylight Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/14/02 4:37:59 PM Central Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< (If only to see if Sandra has some tucked away in a box somewhere) >>

Well.....I have two bulbous, plastic noses tucked away. I'll wear one if you
like.
Actually, I think the idea has merit Elissa!! Can you just see all of us
walking around with those on? It would be hilarious!!! I'll do it.
Ren
